nodes.documentation:
Grantor Role trait
 this adds support for a rolw that allows creation of vesting token grants, allocated from the role holder's wallet
 Owner is not allowed to renounce ownership, lest the contract go without administration.
 But it is ok for owner to shed initially granted roles by removing role from self
nodes.name: GrantorRole

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)
literal_string "Only uniform grantor role can do this."

arguments.value: Only uniform grantor role can do this.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only uniform grantor role can do this."

nodes.documentation:
overridden ERC20 functionality
 ensure there is no way for the contract to end up with no owner

nodes.documentation: allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner
